message.content:
Sure! Here's a balanced and nutritious meal plan for you to enjoy throughout the day:

Breakfast: Overnight Oats with Fresh Berries
- 1/2 cup rolled oats
- 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk or any milk of your choice
- 1/4 cup plain Greek yogurt
- 1/2 tsp vanilla extract
- 1 tbsp honey
- A handful of fresh berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
- Chia seeds and sliced almonds for topping

Combine the oats, milk, yogurt, vanilla, and honey in a jar or bowl. Stir well, cover, and refrigerate overnight. In the morning, add your favorite berries on top along with chia seeds and sliced almonds. Enjoy!

Lunch: Quinoa Salad with Vegetables and Chicken
- 1 cup cooked quinoa (preferably cooled)
- 2 cups mixed salad greens
- 1/2 cup roasted chickpeas
- 1/2 cup diced chicken breast
- 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1/4 cup sliced cucumber
- 1/4 cup thinly sliced red onion
- Dressing: 2 tbsp olive oil, 1 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp honey, salt and pepper to taste

In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, salad greens, chickpeas, chicken, tomatoes, cucumber, and onion. In a separate container, whisk together the dressing ingredients. Pour the dressing over the salad mixture and toss gently until evenly coated. Enjoy!

Snack: Apple with Almond Butter
- 1 medium apple
- 2 tbsp natural almond butter

Core and slice the apple. Serve alongside almond butter for dipping.

Dinner: Grilled Salmon with Vegetables and Quinoa
- 4 oz wild salmon fillet
- 1 cup cooked quinoa
- 1/2 cup grilled vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, asparagus)
- Drizzle of olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Lemon wedges for serving

Preheat your grill or oven broiler. Season the salmon fillet with salt and pepper. Grill or broil for about 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through. On a separate baking sheet, toss the vegetables in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Roast in the oven at 400°F for about 15-20 minutes or grill alongside the salmon until tender. Serve the grilled salmon over a bed of quinoa, accompanied by roasted vegetables and lemon wedges.

Remember to stay hydrated throughout the day by drinking plenty of water! This meal plan provides a balance of nutrients, including carbohydrates, proteins, healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals to keep you energized and feeling great. Enjoy your meals!
